resources.string: ستضم الجولة الجديدة الأعضاء والمساهمين عينهم الذين اشتركوا في الجولة السابقة.
الوصف الاختياري الطويل للبث. %1$s متاح. يجب أن لا يتجاوز طول النص %2$s حرفاً.
عنوان URL الذي سيتحقق منه ليتشيس للحصول على تحديثات PGN. يجب أن يكون متاحا للجميع من الإنترنت.
حتى 64 معرف لُعْبَة ليتشيس، مفصولة بمسافات.
اختياري، إذا كنت تعرف متى يبدأ الحدث
قم بحذف الجولة وجميع ألعابها نهائيا.
احذف كل ألعاب هذه الجولة. سيحتاج المصدر إلى أن يكون فعالاً من أجل إعادة إنشائها.
قم بحذف البطولة كلها, وكل جولاتها, وكل ألعابها.
إظهار نتيجة اللاعبين بناءً على نتائج اللعبة
اختياري: استبدل أسماء اللاعبين وتقييماتهم وألقابهم
لم يتم العثور على لاعب الاتحاد الدولي (FIDE)
اشترك ليتم إعلامك عند بداية كل جولة. يمكنك تفعيل الجرس أو الإشعارات للبث في إعدادات حسابك.
لا توجد لوحات الآن. ستظهر بمجرد رفع المباريات.

string.name: boardsCanBeLoaded
string.comment:
%s is 'Broadcaster App', and links to https://lichess.org/broadcast/app
This is advice that appears in the manager view for broadcasts. The 'source' in this context is where the games to be displayed in the tournament will come from. Games can be sourced in a number of ways (aside from the Broadcaster App, which is what Lichess recommends): * URL(s) pointing to PGN(s) * IDs of games played on Lichess * Lichess usernames

resources.string: يمكن إضافة اللوحات عبر مصدرها أو عبر %s

string.name: officialStandings
string.comment:
Appears in the broadcast creation form (https://lichess.org/broadcast/new), for a tournament that someone wishes to broadcast on Lichess.
This is a field where a tournament organiser can add a URL pointing to the official standings for their tournament.

resources.string: مصدر PGN عام وحقيقي لهذه الجولة. نحن أيضا نقدم %s لمزامنة أسرع وأحسن.
ادمج هذا البث في موقع الويب الخاص بك
ادمج %s في موقع الويب الخاص بك

string.name: gamesThisTournament
string.comment:
Appears as a heading for a list on an individual player's page within a broadcasted tournament. The list shows all the games that individual has played within that tournament.
Example: https://lichess.org/broadcast/fide-womens-grand-prix-202425--pune/round-7/ZPXXCcDI#players/8608059

string.name: allTeams
string.comment:
In this context, these are teams in a tournament that is being broadcast. The tournament format features teams.
This is the default filter option, showing players from all teams in a given tournament.

string.name: tournamentFormat
string.comment: Appears as an optional field in the broadcast creation form (https://lichess.org/broadcast/new), for a tournament that someone wishes to broadcast on Lichess.

string.name: tournamentLocation
string.comment: Appears as an optional field in the broadcast creation form (https://lichess.org/broadcast/new), for a tournament that someone wishes to broadcast on Lichess.

string.name: topPlayers
string.comment:
Appears as an optional field in the broadcast creation form (https://lichess.org/broadcast/new), for a tournament that someone wishes to broadcast on Lichess.
Broadcast creators can enter some top players' names here to attract attention. It is a free-entry field that accepts up to 4 names.

string.name: timezone
string.comment: Appears as an optional field in the broadcast creation form (https://lichess.org/broadcast/new), for a tournament that someone wishes to broadcast on Lichess.

string.name: fideRatingCategory
string.comment:
Appears as an optional field in the broadcast creation form (https://lichess.org/broadcast/new), for a tournament that someone wishes to broadcast on Lichess.
The options for this field are Standard, Blitz, or Rapid.

string.name: optionalDetails
string.comment: Appears as a heading that groups fields in the broadcast creation form (https://lichess.org/broadcast/new), for a tournament that someone wishes to broadcast on Lichess.

resources.string: بما أنك اخترت إخفاء النتائج، فإن جميع لوحات المعاينة فارغة لتجنب الحرق.

string.name: liveboard
string.comment:
Describes a pane in live broadcasts which lets you see what the current move is.
This is useful when you are seeing previous moves in a live game, but still want to see the live/current position.
